thread.title: WATCH: BFFs admit each other’s love feelings at ‘Wowowin’ segment
thread.title_full: WATCH: BFFs admit each other’s love feelings at ‘Wowowin’ segment

author: gcatolico
title: WATCH: BFFs admit each other’s love feelings at ‘Wowowin’ segment
text:
WATCH: BFFs admit each other’s love feelings at ‘Wowowin’ segment INQUIRER.net / 11:45 AM February 06, 2017 
In time for Valentine’s season, two “besties” admitted their feelings for each other in a viral episode of Wowowin on Friday. 
Delfin, a contestant in the game show, introduced Vane, his quirky female best friend, who had patiently lined up with him for the show’s auditions. ADVERTISEMENT 
When host Willie Revillame requested them to dedicate a ‘thank you” message to each other, Delfin used his own moment to express his infatuation for his loyal best friend. 
“Ayun, lulubusin ko na, masasabi ko na yung nararamdaman ko para sa’yo (I will take this opportunity to confess my feelings for you),” Delfin said, to the sheer delight and “kilig” (thrill) of the audience. “Isa ka sa mga inspirasyon ko, lagi kitang iniisip, [at] may gusto ‘ata ako sa’yo (You are one of my inspirations, I think of you every time, and I think I’m falling in love with you).” 
However, he promised to wait for Vane until they finish their studies. “Face doesn’t matter,” he joked to Revillame. 
In a creative response to his revelation, Vane sung lyrics of the classic song “Can’t Help Falling in Love” and said she respected his feelings and would continue to support him all the way. 
Delfin said that he admired some of Vane’s qualities–she is a whiz in playing the violin and piano, in addition to her melodic singing skills and personality. 
The Wowowin episode was one of the most-streamed clips on YouTube as of Monday. Gianna Francesca Catolico
